app

Class TRLApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.TRLApp

  • public class TRLApp
extends java.lang.Object
    TRLApp Textbook Rental Library Application SEIS 635 Group Project Professor: Eric Level This application implements a textbook rental library that keeps track of transactions between the library and its patrons. The application provides logic to support a library attendant managing library assets and transactions with customers. For more information see the project specifications in the /doc.
    Author:
    Kevin Um, Justin Siu-Ting Hui, Sheng Lor
